scripts.build:js: cat node_modules/lightgallery/lightgallery.min.js node_modules/lightgallery/plugins/thumbnail/lg-thumbnail.min.js node_modules/lightgallery/plugins/zoom/lg-zoom.min.js js/lightgallery-init.js > public/js/lightgallery.bundle.min.js && cp js/region-map.js public/js/
scripts.build:vendor: mkdir -p public/vendor/lightgallery/css public/vendor/lightgallery/images public/vendor/lightgallery/fonts public/js && cp node_modules/lightgallery/css/lightgallery-bundle.min.css public/vendor/lightgallery/css/ && cp node_modules/lightgallery/images/* public/vendor/lightgallery/images/ && cp node_modules/lightgallery/fonts/* public/vendor/lightgallery/fonts/ && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js public/js/alpine.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:vendor && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min
scripts.watch:css: chokidar "css/*.css" "views/**/*.hbs" -c "npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min"
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --names server,watch --prefix-colors cyan,yellow "nodemon server.js" "npm run watch"
